snp3.10:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
snp3.10:1.3: Atha kho kokaliko bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho kokaliko bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
snp3.10:1.4: “papiccha, bhante, sariputtamoggallana, papikanam icchanam vasam gata”ti.
snp3.10:2.1: Evam vutte, bhagava kokalikam bhikkhum etadavoca:
snp3.10:3.2: tatiyampi kho kokaliko bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
snp3.10:3.3: “kincapi me, bhante, bhagava saddhayiko paccayiko, atha kho papicchava sariputtamoggallana, papikanam icchanam vasam gata”ti.
snp3.10:3.4: Tatiyampi kho bhagava kokalikam bhikkhum etadavoca:
snp3.10:4.1: Atha kho kokaliko bhikkhu utthayasana bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva pakkami.
snp3.10:4.2: Acirappakkantassa ca kokalikassa bhikkhuno sasapamattihi pilakahi sabbo kayo phuto ahosi;
snp3.10:4.3: sasapamattiyo hutva muggamattiyo ahesum; muggamattiyo hutva kalayamattiyo ahesum; kalayamattiyo hutva kolatthimattiyo ahesum; kolatthimattiyo hutva kolamattiyo ahesum; kolamattiyo hutva amalakamattiyo ahesum; amalakamattiyo hutva beluvasalatukamattiyo ahesum; beluvasalatukamattiyo hutva billamattiyo ahesum; billamattiyo hutva pabhijjimsu; pubbanca lohitanca paggharimsu.
snp3.10:4.4: Atha kho kokaliko bhikkhu tenevabadhena kalamakasi.
snp3.10:4.5: Kalankato ca kokaliko bhikkhu padumam nirayam upapajji sariputtamoggallanesu cittam aghatetva.
snp3.10:5.1: Atha kho brahma sahampati abhikkantaya rattiya abhikkantavanno kevalakappam jetavanam obhasetva yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam atthasi. Ekamantam thito kho brahma sahampati bhagavantam etadavoca:
snp3.10:5.3: kalankato ca, bhante, kokaliko bhikkhu padumam nirayam upapanno sariputtamoggallanesu cittam aghatetva”ti.
snp3.10:5.5: idam vatva bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva tatthevantaradhayi.
snp3.10:6.1: Atha kho bhagava tassa rattiya accayena bhikkhu amantesi:
snp3.10:6.2: “imam, bhikkhave, rattim brahma sahampati abhikkantaya rattiya …pe…
snp3.10:6.3: idamavoca, bhikkhave, brahma sahampati, idam vatva mam padakkhinam katva tatthevantaradhayi”ti.
snp3.10:7.1: Evam vutte, annataro bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
snp3.10:7.2: “kivadigham nu kho, bhante, padume niraye ayuppamanan”ti?
snp3.10:7.4: tam na sukaram sankhatum ettakani vassani iti va ettakani vassasatani iti va ettakani vassasahassani iti va ettakani vassasatasahassani iti va”ti.
snp3.10:8.1: “Seyyathapi, bhikkhu, visatikhariko kosalako tilavaho; tato puriso vassasatassa vassasatassa accayena ekamekam tilam uddhareyya.
snp3.10:8.2: Khippataram kho so bhikkhu visatikhariko kosalako tilavaho imina upakkamena parikkhayam pariyadanam gaccheyya, na tveva eko abbudo nirayo.
snp3.10:8.3: Seyyathapi, bhikkhu, visati abbuda niraya evameko nirabbudo nirayo.
snp3.10:8.4: Seyyathapi, bhikkhu, visati nirabbuda niraya evameko ababo nirayo.
snp3.10:8.5: Seyyathapi, bhikkhu, visati ababa niraya evameko atato nirayo.
snp3.10:8.6: Seyyathapi, bhikkhu, visati atata niraya evameko ahaho nirayo.
snp3.10:8.7: Seyyathapi, bhikkhu, visati ahaha niraya evameko kumudo nirayo.
snp3.10:8.8: Seyyathapi, bhikkhu, visati kumuda niraya evameko sogandhiko nirayo.
snp3.10:8.9: Seyyathapi, bhikkhu, visati sogandhika niraya evameko uppalako nirayo.
snp3.10:8.10: Seyyathapi, bhikkhu, visati uppalaka niraya evameko pundariko nirayo.
snp3.10:8.11: Seyyathapi, bhikkhu, visati pundarika niraya evameko padumo nirayo.
snp3.10:8.12: Padumam kho pana bhikkhu nirayam kokaliko bhikkhu upapanno sariputtamoggallanesu cittam aghatetva”ti.
snp3.10:8.14: Idam vatvana sugato athaparam etadavoca sattha:
